I think I see how this could happen..more investigation needed but not critial 
as all you will lose is a hyperlink.

I cannot directly reproduce but I have reproduced problems with files with 
spaces in the names and have re-worked.

Fixed in BuildFailedTracker.
Added test to BuildTests.testBuildFailedMessage
*** Bug 47728 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
